thread.title: Marin Cilic wins in Moscow but misses out on ATP World Tour Finals
thread.title_full: Marin Cilic wins in Moscow but misses out on ATP World Tour Finals

title: Marin Cilic wins in Moscow but misses out on ATP World Tour Finals
text:
Marin Cilic wins in Moscow but misses out on ATP World Tour Finals 25 Oct 2015 17:01:52 
comments 
Top seed Marin Cilic overcame Roberto Bautista Agut to retain the Kremlin Cup but the victory was not enough to secure him a place in the end-of-season ATP World Tour Finals. 
Cilic won 6-4 6-4, the same score by which he beat the second-seeded Bautista Agut in Moscow 12 months ago, to climb two places to 11th in the Race to London, although David Ferrer's subsequent title run in Vienna put him out of the running for one of the two remaining spots in London. 
Cilic, who was limited to one tournament in the first three months of the season due to a shoulder injury, saved all four break points against Spaniard Bautista Agut, who fought all the way in his pursuit of a first ATP title since 2014. Related Sport News
